page.title: 03LOCAL CHARACTERS.
page.content: LOCAL CHARACTORS MR HIGGINS. Mr Higgins was church warden at Mathon for many years.He owned the small mining engineering company at Worcester which he founded in a small way at Shefield.He lived at Moorend Court. MR COLIN PHIPPS. At one time Mr Colin Phipps was Labour M.P.for Dudley.He is the biggest land owner in Mathon. Now he is in the Social Democrats Party and lives at Mathon Court,where he runs Mathon Galery. He also owns a small oil company.The tennis club pay a nominal rent for their courts to him.
